TITLE: FDA asks drugmakers to update Covid boosters to target XBB.1.5 for the fall
SUMMARY: The updated shots are expected to be distributed as early as September as part of a fall booster campaign

TITLE: U.S. intelligence community remains divided over likely Covid origin, report shows
SUMMARY: The report's release was required by the Covid–19 Origin Act of 2023, which was passed unanimously by both chambers of Congress and signed into law by President Joe Biden

TITLE: Fraudsters may have stolen $200 billion in federal Covid relief funds, new report says
SUMMARY: The new estimate from the Small Business Administration's watchdog would be nearly one-fifth of all the money disbursed in two federal aid programs from 2020 to 2022

TITLE: White House Covid response coordinator Ashish Jha to step down
SUMMARY: Jha’s departure is the latest example of the Biden administration's putting the pandemic in the rearview mirror

TITLE: When should you come out of Covid isolation? Experts weigh in.
SUMMARY: The CDC says we should isolate for five days after testing positive. Other public health officials disagree. Who is right

TITLE: FDA advisers to discuss next round of Covid boosters for the fall
SUMMARY: FDA scientists said in briefing documents the next iteration of the boosters should target an XBB strain

TITLE: Biden picks North Carolina's former health chief, Mandy Cohen, to run CDC
SUMMARY: Cohen, the former secretary of the state's Department of Health and Human Services, will replace infectious disease expert Rochelle Walensky, who's stepping down June 30

TITLE: China faces a new Covid wave that could peak at 65 million cases a week
SUMMARY: The country once had some of the harshest Covid restrictions on the planet, but the response from the government and the public is relatively muted this time

TITLE: Your costs for Covid tests and treatments may rise after the public health emergency ends
SUMMARY: The federal Covid public health emergency ends Thursday. After that, many people may incur new expenses for tests

TITLE: 12 of the most common long Covid symptoms identified in long-awaited new report
SUMMARY: The new research is meant to help scientists move forward in finding a treatment for a condition that still plagues millions of Americans
